scripts.lint: cd options-reader && npm run lint && cd ../cli && npm run lint && cd ../core && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd options-reader && npx nyc npm test && cd .. && cd core && npx nyc npm test && cd ..
scripts.compile: cd core && npm run compile && npm run package && cd ../options-reader && npm run compile && cd ../cli && npm run compile
scripts.install: cd options-reader && npm install && cd ../cli && npm install && cd ../core && npm install
scripts.link: cd core && npm i && npm run package && cd build/package && npm link && cd ../../.. && cd options-reader && npm i && npm link typeorm-core && npm run compile && cd build/compiled/src/ && npm link && cd ../../../../cli && npm link typeorm-core
